doc:
Rod Hull https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rod_Hull 0 Rodney Stephen "Rod" Hull (13 August 1935 – 17 March 1999) was an English comedian, best known as a popular entertainer on British television in the 1970s and 1980s. He rarely appeared without Emu, a mute, highly aggressive arm-length puppet modelled on the Australian flightless emu bird. Rodney_Stephen_"_Rod_"_Hull ( 13_August_1935 – 17_March_1999 ) was an_English_comedian , best_known as a_popular_entertainer on British_television in the_1970s_and_1980s . He rarely appeared without Emu , a_mute_,_highly_aggressive_arm-length_puppet modelled on the_Australian_flightless_emu_bird .
